p: The concentration of the MTX in the solid SMEDDS slightly decreased in the forced photodegradation test after 20 days (87.44±1.93%) and the confirmatory test after 12 weeks (90.57±1.46%) compared to the initial concentration of pure MTX. Whereas, a sharp decrease by nearly 40% in the concentration of MTX (63.21±1.75 and 61.52±2.37%, respectively) was observed.
